definition: flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]
head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: You don't want a crewcut, do you?
Will the clean-cut appearance of these students become mere historical remembrances after the lifting of hairstyle regulations?
sentences.chinese: 學生所留的平頭，在髮禁開放後會不會變成歷史鏡頭？

sentences.english: Small flat belt person constantly poured gasoline, He Junfeng before stop quickly.
sentences.chinese: 小平頭帶人在不停的澆汽油，賀俊峯見狀趕緊阻止。

sentences.english: People in the street, ask crew-cut dignitaries asked in temple.
sentences.chinese: 平頭百姓求於街頭，達官顯貴問於廟堂。

sentences.english: Perot had big jug ears, which were accentuated by his short crew cut.
sentences.chinese: 佩羅長着招風大耳，剪得很短的平頭使耳朵更加突出。

sentences.english: Mike the albino with the crewcut can be the general contractor.
sentences.chinese: 平頭的白化病者可以成爲總承包商。

sentences.english: In my time players had short hair, wore long shorts, and played in hobnail boots.
sentences.chinese: 我那個時代，球員們留短髮，穿長褲和平頭釘的鞋。

sentences.english: A warrior, of the jarhead clan.
It looks like a buzz cut right now.
sentences.chinese: 現在看起來像剃了平頭。

sentences.english: Tapping screws, Pan head, Phillips or Pozi drive, zinc or black phosphated.
sentences.chinese: 鐵板牙螺絲，平頭，十字槽，鍍鋅或磷化黑色。

sentences.english: Side view of square head bolt with adjustable thread length.
sentences.chinese: 螺紋長度可調整的平頭一字槽螺釘的側面圖。

sentences.english: But it is also hardly to realize for us ordinary people.
sentences.chinese: 然而這對於我這種平頭百姓，也是難以實現的夢想。

sentences.english: On Thursday was the big fishing trip on Flathead Lake.
sentences.chinese: 星期四是到平頭湖釣魚的大日子。

sentences.english: Common folk had only vague notions of their own image in the broad sense.
sentences.chinese: 平頭百姓對自己的形像只有模糊的廣義上的概念。

sentences.english: It was the sound of boots, heavy hobnail boots.
sentences.chinese: 那是靴子的聲音，沉重的平頭釘靴子。
